content: Back to school? What's school? Is that like a kind of food or something, bhan?
info: 闲聊-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-0保底_新特殊反馈

content: They say today's the day that the little ones go off to school. Me? When I was a cub, I'd sit on the roof, listening to the lessons taught by the wind. And it was real windy.
info: 闲聊-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-0保底_新特殊反馈
